verbs.description: sf school board changes [V: lowell] [ARG1: admission] policy to accept all qualified willie brown students the san francisco school board took a small step toward increasing access to the academically elite lowell high school allowing all qualified applicants from a predominantly black middle school to automatically earn admission the unanimous vote took aim at the racial disparities at lowell one of the top public high schools in the country the high school which uses primarily grades and test scores to admit students has a disproportionate number of asian and white students last year just one black male was among the 500 freshmen said board member mark sanchez lowell school black middle school lowell high school willie l brown middle school san francisco school accept willie brown mark sanchez
